en-US: Please double-check and make sure that the language and topic requirements in this hive suit your needs. As the guidelines mentioned above, you are not allowed to speak any language other than the allowed languages in this hive, and posts that are not related to the allowed topics is not allowed as well.
zh-CN: 请仔细检查并确保该蜂巢的语言和主题要求符合您的需求。正如上面提到的指南，您不允许在此蜂巢中使用除允许的语言之外的任何语言，并且与允许的主题无关的帖子与讨论也是不允许的。
